metadata.title: CVE-2021-20275 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in privoxy before 3.0.32. A invalid read of size two may occur in chunked_body_is_complete() leading to denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.33-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.33-1').
